rules_text:
Job select [i](When this artifact enters, create a 1/1 colorless Hero creature token to it. Then attach this artifact to that creature.)[/i]
Equipped creature has base power and toughness 3/4, has flying, and is a Cleric in addition to its other types.
Equip {5}{W} [i]({5}{W}: Attach to target creature you control. Equip only as a sorcery.)[/i]
